job.title: Azure Open AI Expert for GPT 4 Model Implementation
job.description:
We are seeking an Azure Open AI expert who has extensive experience in developing solutions to implement the GPT 4 model on enterprise data. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of Azure technologies and a strong background in artificial intelligence and natural language processing. You will be responsible for designing and implementing the GPT 4 model, ensuring its scalability and efficiency for enterprise-level data processing. This is an exciting opportunity to work on cutting-edge technology and make a significant impact in the field of AI. 

Skills required:
- Proficient in Azure Open AI
- Strong knowledge of GPT 4 model
- Experience with enterprise data processing
- Expertise in artificial intelligence and natural language processing
- .NET Core

If you are passionate about AI and want to be part of a dynamic team pushing the boundaries of technology, then we want to hear from you!

Please provide examples of your previous work in the field of Azure Open AI and GPT models.

questions.question: Describe your recent experience with similar projects
